text: A hunting dog met a lion and set off in pursuit. But the lion roared again, and the dog, all frightened, quickly retreated down the same path. A fox saw him and said, "Unfortunate dog! First you chased the lion and now you can't even stand his roar! When you set up a business, think of the unforeseen.
title: El perro que perseguía al león
author: nan Esopo
